title: Polyphosphazene-based hyper crosslinked polymers for efficient uranium ion removal from nuclear wastewater
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,2961-2980
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00614C, Paper
Rimsha Khalid, Isham Areej, Faiza Ashraf, Saqlain Raza, Amin Abid, Tayyab Ahsan, Bien Tan
This study focuses on the removal of uranium ions from nuclear wastewater by fabricating inorganicâ€“organic hybrid cyclic and linear polyphosphazene based polymers.
